Gabrielle Giffords is making`` remarkable progress'' as she recovers from last month's shooting in Tucson and has started speaking, making specific requests for food and talking to loved ones. Since his return, in October, Ben Roethlisberger has tried to be a better teammate and a better person. Like the Eagles' Michael Vick , he has been contrite and has said all the right things. It would be amazing to win another Super Bowl, but it won't be like I'll say,` Do you forgive me now?' It'll just be another step in earning back everything I lost, he told the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette's Ron Cook last week. Ben Roethlisberger faced the national media for the first time yesterday afternoon at the Steelers' hotel in Fort Worth, Texas, and it didn't take long

Larry Page will once again assume the role of CEO. Thursday afternoon, Eric Schmidt announced that he will be moving to the role of Executive Chairman of Google's board of directors, where he will focus on wherever[ he] can add the greatest value. This might mean making deals, forging partnerships, broadening business relationships, or performing government outreach. Eric Schmidt also says he will act as an advisor to Page and co-founder Sergey Brin .`` As Google has grown

When they left my house they were all arrested, these are Hosni Mubarak 's promises#Jan25.'' 1210May Mohamed ElBaradei Tabbakh in Alexandria wants security to be restored in her area: I have been locked in at home for more than a week now. I've heard gunshots and struggles outside. All the men on our street are armed to protect their homes. Neither my husband nor other men here have slept. Also, there are prisoners on the loose which is a big issue. People have not been able to go out to work. The well-off are OK as they have stored food. But the poor are really suffering- they are starving. Mosa'ab Elshamy tweets:`` Mixed feelings towards Arab League Colin Powell Secretary, Amr Moussa . Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had`` severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. The

'' The congressman's future has been the subject of speculation since he resigned the No. 3 GOP House leadership slot after winning a sixth term in November. Mike Pence , who often describes himself as a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order, is one of the party's most vocal critics of Barack Obama .
